sentence.Network_en: I don't think he intended her any disrespect.
sentence.Network_cn: 我认为他对她没有不恭的意思.

sentence.Network_en: No disrespect to John Beck, but the club has been happier since he left.
sentence.Network_cn: 我对约翰·贝克绝无不敬之意，但自他离开后俱乐部气氛的确更活跃了。

sentence.Network_en: This isn't a sign of disrespect in any way.
sentence.Network_cn: 这不是不尊重别人的表现.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语新词汇与常用词汇的翻译(D) ... disrepute 坏名声 disrespect 失礼 disrespectable 不值得尊重的.
心理学专业词汇翻译辞典 - MBA智库文档 ... disrelish 不喜爱 disrespect 无礼 disruptive behavior 破坏行为破坏行为.
《GRE & TOEFL 核心词汇实验教程》电子书下载 ... RESPECT 尊重 DISRESPECT 不尊重 PRAISE 赞扬.
SAT Official Guide V-Mate ... skepticism 怀疑态度 disrespect 不尊敬，无礼，轻蔑 caution 小心，谨慎.

list.abs: to disrespect wealth and devote to righteousness轻财仗义
The way this girl talks is so disrespectful !, 这女孩子说话真没大小!
your tween is talking back in a flippant , disrespectful manner . while tween back-talk and sass are on the rise , allowing it is a huge mistake .当你的孩子以轻率、无礼的方式顶嘴时，当你的孩子爱顶嘴和爱说狂妄的话的问题日趋严重，你必须承认那是个错误。

but I also believe that when a gangbanger shoots indiscriminately into a crowd because he feels somebody disrespected him , we have a problem of morality .但是我也相信，当一名黑帮成员因为觉得有人不尊敬他，而不分清红皂白地向人群开枪时，那我们的道德准则就有问题了。

entry.def: If someone shows disrespect, they speak or behave in a way that shows lack of respect for a person, law, or custom.

example.ex: ...young people with complete disrespect for authority.
example.tran: 根本不把权威放在眼里的年轻人

entry.tran: (在表示批评某人或某物时)绝无不尊敬之意
entry.def: You can say 'no disrespect to someone or something' when you are just about to criticize them, in order to indicate that you are not hostile towards them or admire them for other things.

example.ex: No disrespect to John Beck, but the club has been happier since he left.
example.tran: 我对约翰·贝克绝无不敬之意，但自他离开后俱乐部气氛的确更活跃了。

means.word_mean: 1. an expression of lack of respect
3. a manner that is generally disrespectful and contemptuous
1. show a lack of respect for
2. have little or no respect for; hold in contempt

auth_sentence.content: Some waved shoes as a sign of anger and disrespect.
auth_sentence.res_content: Some waved shoes as a sign of anger and disrespect.

auth_sentence.content: To all of these people the Synod yesterday showed disrespect.
